text: Zamagra amanage hu'za zavi zagamera hu'za zavira ategantegahaze. Kagimo'ma haruharuma higenka marerisa ranku'mamoka, nahigenka havizana hane. Kagra hagerina kegava hunenka, maka zago fenontera kegava hankeno tava'onka'are'ma mani'naza vahe'mo'za zamahirahiku hu'naze. Hianagi ventekamo'a menina haviza hu'ne.
